sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'zadanie'; form: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ tytul: new FormControl(), rodzaj: new FormControl() }) dodaj() : void { console.log(this.form.value) } }
